import React from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Row, Col, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './App.css'; import BarChart from './components/BarChart'; import DoughnutChart from './components/DoughnutChart'; import DashboardBlock from './components/DashboardBlock'; import CastRulesTable from './components/CastRulesTable'; const labels: string[] = [ 'feb. 2021', 'march 2021', 'april 2021', 'may 2021', 'june 2021', 'jul. 2021', 'aug. 2021' ]; const dataColors = { blue: '#3B82F6', green: '#10B981' } const data = { labels: labels, datasets: [{ label: 'Cloud GCP', backgroundColor: dataColors.green, borderColor: dataColors.green, borderWidth: 0, data: [373.86, 428.33, 380.59, 470.96, 440.3, 402.87, 380.59], barThickness: 40, }, { label: 'Users Devices', backgroundColor: dataColors.blue, borderColor: dataColors.blue, borderWidth: 0, data: [773.86, 806.81, 763.93, 801.12, 733.2, 688.38, 770.96], barThickness: 40, }] }; class App extends React.Component { render() { return ( IT Carbon Footprint (demo)
